item.description:
Sorry guys.  I had to limit this to 30 people, otherwise it is going to be too big for the venues we're going to.  If you know you can't make it, please change your RSVP and let others join.  Thanks

 

Please join us if you enjoy:

- the colors purple, green, and yellow

- finding the baby Jesus in your King Cake

- being a part of the ongoing distribution and redistribution of plastic beaded necklaces

- nights of excess, and are in need something to repent before lent.

 

Since there is little French influence in Providence's drinking establishments, we'll have to bring the joie de vivre with us on our Mardi Gras adventure.

 

Here are the details for our journey:

There will be a $5 charge for each person joining us.  This will cover beads, and some other party favors to make us stand out from the crowd.

 

At 7pm, we'll begin with a bite and a drink or two at:

Celtic Lounge (Formerly Finnegan's Draft House)

397 Westminster Street Providence, RI 02903

 (401) 751-0290

 (P.S. the food is delicious here)

 

At about 8:30, we'll move to:

Muldowney's Pub

103 Empire St.

Providence, RI 02903

(401) 831-6202

(Note: this is a quirky dive bar, and it is cash only)

 

At 10:00 we'll move a little further down the street to:

Trinity Brewhouse

 186 Fountain St.

 Providence, RI 02903

 (401) 453-2337

 

Around midnight, for the last stop on our tour of sinning fun, we have two options. We'll base the decision on a little reconnaissance work to test the atmosphere at each, before we move the whole group.

 

Murphy's Deli and Bar

100 Fountain St.

Providence, Rhode Island 02903

(401)621-8467

 

OR

 

Sullivan's Rhode

55 Union St.

Providence, RI 02903

(401)383-0852

 

Please note: These times and places could change depending on any number of unknown things that could come up.  I will send an email with my cell number on Saturday afternoon to those who RSVP, so you can find us if we wander off course.
item.name: Mardi Gras Celebration
